content: SP Universal A diamond blade Premium diamond blade engineered to maximize your cuts-per-charge and cutting speed with battery-powered cut-off saws, in a wide range of base materials ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond blades and cup wheels- - - ### FEATURES:Features Increase productivity – our blades are specifically developed for your DSH 600-22 and DSH 700-22 battery cut-off saws to optimize performance More cuts per charge – thinner blade consumes less power when slicing through base materials Smoother cuts – thanks to redesigned, lower-friction diamond segments Strict quality standards – every diamond segment is laser welded and individually tested before any blade leaves the factory Cutting-edge technology - Hilti Equidist arranged diamond segments provide superior cutting speed and performance on reinforced concrete Applications Resizing a wide range of concrete, masonry, and granite elements Cutting openings into floors and walls For use with DSH 600-22 and DSH 700-22 battery cut-off saws ### TECHNICAL DATA: Tool type: Battery cut-off saw Base material: Concrete, Concrete (reinforced), Masonry, Natural stone Product Class: Premium Technical Data | Tool type | Battery cut-off saw | Base material | Concrete, Concrete (reinforced), Masonry, Natural stone | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2391011 - Dia blade 12x1 SP univ A - Package Size 1 pc - 2391012 - Dia blade 12x1 (6) SP univ A - Package Size 6 pc
